content:
### Node enhancements

* [RabbitMQ Trigger node](/integrations/builtin/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.rabbitmqtrigger.md): Made message acknowledgement and parallel processing configurable.
* [ServiceNow node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.servicenow.md): Added support for attachments.
* [Todoist node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.todoist.md): Added support for specifying the parent task when adding and listing tasks.
